name: Carsten's Broat
description:
Game made in a weekend (+1 day) for a little self-imposed jam I did with @SIACTRO.

Board Carsten's trusty broat, bake pastry and deliver it to the very hungry residents in this mix of Cook, Serve, Delicious and The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker.

...yes, you read that correctly.

There's no real progression so to speak: explore the seas, relax, bake some bread.

There's a host of issues due to the very short time the game was made in. Also no tutorial, but the game should mostly be understandable if you follow the button prompts.

Some known issues:
  • Only CONTROLLERS (Xbox, DualSense and MAYBE some others) are supported for now!
  • You can resize the window to any aspect ratio you want, but this will break the UI 99% of the time
  • There's absolutely 0 graphics/audio options. What you see/hear is what you get for now. The game is also likely not super optimized, sorry (again: something, something, time constraints)
  • You can only close the game by pressing ESC.

I might release an update to the game later down the line, fixing some of these issues. We'll see.

CREDITS:
  • @SIACTRO - for surviving this grind of a weekend with me
  • Music by MusMus https://musmus.main.jp/
  • Xbox controller buttons by - https://zacksly.itch.io/
  • My Twitch chat - for existing
